content.question: In lines 11-13 (“Our hearts . . . ingross”), the speaker most clearly uses which of the following to characterize a type of experience?

choices.label: Repetition to hint at the friendship’s lack of excitement
Paradox to convey the intensity of a relationship
Words with negative connotations to imply ongoing struggle

content.answer: Paradox to convey the intensity of a relationship

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
